roleset.name: cast into shadow
roleset.note: SHADE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls defend-85. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from shade.01-v)

roles.note: Could take arg for thing shaded from. If you see one, send it in! (from shade.01-v)

example.name: pseudopassive
example.text: [The road leading south along the river]-1 was shaded [*-1]with old trees...

example.name: active
example.text: The day's sun was gathering its strength in gold, and she-1 wished she had brought her parasol, if only [*-1] to shade Doaty's flowers.
